title: String Rotation
description: Write a function `is_rotation` that checks if one string is a rotation of another. Two strings are rotations of each other if the second string can be obtained by shifting the characters in the first string cyclically to the right or left.
code:
def is_rotation(s1: str, s2: str) -> bool:
    return len(s1) == len(s2) and (s1 + s1).find(s2) != -1
